column4: Anyone use Conky? I'm trying to add audacious to it but I can't figure it out, it's just like "${audacious_status}" right? and the same way for the title and time? It's not working for me.
give me a sec to look it up
in conky manual page it says that audacious_title is followed by a number that shows the max characters it can contain
but it does not work for me
Yeah, but the syntax is just ${audacious_status} right? Because it's not working for me.
i put ${audacious_title 60} and no results. i guess it may need to be compiled with the audacious option enabled
Yeah I'm kind of thinking that also.
let me look for compiling options
How do you find the compiled options anyways for packages you download through apt?
from gentoo's wiki or in the apps url i guess
let me look about the compiles options in the repo
it is compiled to use mpd that NO ONE is using, but not audacious!
you can use apt-source to get the source and make a .deb, change the options and compile
in case you look for the audacious option its        --enable-audacious=yes|no|legacy
